description:
Learn how to make this game! https://academy.zenva.com/product/create-a-retro-local-multiplayer-game/

How To Play

  • Player 1
    • AD keys to move (left/right)
    • W key to jump
    • Space key to shoot
  • Player 2
    • Left/Right arrow keys to move (left/right)
    • Up arrow key to jump
    • Control key to shoot

Create a Retro Local Multiplayer Game

Discover techniques for creating local multiplayer games with the popular Unity engine. Using Unity’s Input System, you’ll learn how to detect actions from different controllers and render multiple, nearby players to the same screen – all while creating a retro-styled, 2D action game. You’ll not only master powerful features available with Unity’s API, but gain game development knowledge that can be used to expand your single-player game projects in new directions.

You will learn how to:

  • Use Unity’s Input System for control schemes
  • Detect different player controllers
  • Spawn multiple players with different colors
  • Implement combat detection between players
  • Set up multiplayer-compatible UIs
  • Work with particles and animations

… and more!
